message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $14,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to share the product. I am able to offer $12,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.
Bob, I understand your offer, but the product's value is significantly higher to me. I'm willing to come down to $13,250. This is a fair price considering its potential worth to you.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I am still unable to meet at $13,250. However, I would like to propose $12,500 for the product. I hope this proposal is within your consideration.
